thread.title: Ward has hat trick as Sharks beat Hurricanes to snap skid
thread.title_full: Ward has hat trick as Sharks beat Hurricanes to snap skid

title: Ward has hat trick as Sharks beat Hurricanes to snap skid
text: Ward has hat trick as Sharks beat Hurricanes to snap skid Sunday, 25 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) Joel Ward had a hat trick to help the San Jose Sharks end a three-game losing streak with a 5-2 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Saturday night. OTTAWA, Ontario (AP) Mikkel Boedker was happier to see the Arizona Coyotes snap their losing streak than score a hat trick. FOX Sports 54 minutes ago - Sports SAN JOSE, Calif. - Joel Ward had a hat trick to help the San Jose Sharks end a three-game losing streak with a 5-2 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on... NHL 1 hour ago - Sports The San Jose Sharks beat the Carolina Hurricanes as Joel Ward recorded a hat trick San Jose Mercury News 2 hours ago - Sports Ward gets a hat trick to help Sharks snap three-game skid with 5-2 win over Hurricanes ABCNews.com 2 hours ago - Front Page You Might Like
